name: @jfrog/mcp-jfrog
description: Manage your repositories, track builds, and oversee the release lifecycle seamlessly. Leverage powerful AQL queries to search for artifacts and monitor runtime clusters effectively. Enhance your JFrog platform experience with this integrated MCP server.

tools.name: jfrog_check_availability
tools.description: Check if JFrog platform is ready and functioning or not

tools.name: jfrog_create_local_repository
tools.description: Create a new local repository in artifactroy

projectKey.description: Project key to assign the repository to

environments.description: Environments to assign the repository to

tools.name: jfrog_create_remote_repository
tools.description: Create a new remote repository in Artifactory to proxy external package registries

projectKey.description: Project key to assign the repository to

environments.description: Environments to assign the repository to

tools.name: jfrog_create_virtual_repository
tools.description: Create a new virtual repository in Artifactory that aggregates multiple repositories

projectKey.description: Project key to assign the repository to

environments.description: Environments to assign the repository to

repositories.description: List of repository keys to include in the virtual repository

excludesPattern.description: Pattern to define artifacts to exclude

includesPattern.description: Pattern to define artifacts to include

debianTrivialLayout.description: Whether to use trivial layout for Debian repositories

tools.name: jfrog_set_folder_property
tools.description: Set properties on a folder in Artifactory, with optional recursive application

recursive.description: Whether to apply properties recursively to sub-folders

folderPath.description: Path to the folder where properties should be set

properties.description: Key-value pairs of properties to set

tools.name: jfrog_list_repositories
tools.description: List all repositories in Artifactory with optional filtering by type, package type, and project

tools.name: jfrog_list_builds
tools.description: return a list of all my build in the jfrog platform

tools.name: jfrog_get_specific_build
tools.description: Get details for a specific build by name, optionally scoped to a project

project.description: Optional project key to scope the build search

buildName.description: Name of the build to retrieve

tools.name: jfrog_list_runtime_clusters
tools.description: return a list of all my runtime clusters in the jfrog platform

limit.description: The maximum number of clusters to return

next_key.description: The next key to use for pagination

tools.name: jfrog_get_runtime_specific_cluster
tools.description: return a runtime cluster by id

clusterId.description: The ID of the cluster to retrieve

tools.name: jfrog_list_running_images
tools.description: List all running container images across runtime clusters with their security and operational status

tools.name: jfrog_list_environments
tools.description: Get a list of all environments types (e.g. dev, prod, etc.) in the JFrog platform with their details

tools.name: jfrog_list_projects
tools.description: Get a list of all projects in the JFrog platform with their details

tools.name: jfrog_create_project
tools.description: Create a new project in the JFrog platform

project_key.description: Unique identifier for the project, Project key must start with a lowercase letter and only contain lowercase letters

manage_members.description: Whether project admins can manage members

index_resources.description: Whether project admins can index resources

manage_resources.description: Whether project admins can manage resources

storage_quota_bytes.description: Storage quota in bytes (-1 for unlimited)

tools.name: jfrog_get_specific_project
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific project in the JFrog platform

project_key.description: The unique key of the project to retrieve

tools.name: jfrog_execute_aql_query
tools.description: Execute an Artifactory Query Language (AQL) query to search for artifacts, builds, or other entities in JFrog Artifactory. AQL is a powerful query language for searching and filtering artifacts in Artifactory repositories. It supports complex criteria, sorting, pagination, and more.

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return

query.description: The AQL query to execute. Must follow AQL syntax (e.g., items.find({"repo":"my-repo"}).include("name","path"))

domain.description: The primary domain to search in. If not specified, it will be extracted from the query.

transitive.description: Whether to search in remote repositories

include_fields.description: Fields to include in the results

tools.name: jfrog_get_package_info
tools.description: Useful for when you need to get publicly available information about a software package. it will provide you with the following information on it, if available in public sources: a short description of the package, its latest published version, the software license this software is distributed under, along with urls of its version control system, its homepage and whether it is known to be a malicious package (in any version).

name.description: The name of the package, as it appears in the package repository.

version.description: The version of the package, as it appears in the package repository. Default value is 'latest'.

tools.name: jfrog_get_package_versions
tools.description: Useful for when you need to get a list of versions of a publicly available package. it can tell you each version's publication date. Can also filter based on version vulnerability status.

name.description: The name of the package, as it appears in the package repository.

tools.name: jfrog_get_package_version_vulnerabilities
tools.description: Useful for when you need the list of known vulnerabilities affecting a specific version of an open source package.

name.description: The name of the package, as it appears in the package repository.

version.description: The version of the package, as it appears in the package repository. Default value is 'latest'.

pageSize.description: Number of vulnerabilities to return per page.

tools.name: jfrog_get_vulnerability_info
tools.description: Useful for when you need to get a specific vulnerability information, including its affected packages and versions.

cve_id.description: The CVE ID or vulnerability identifier to look up.

pageSize.description: Number of vulnerabilities to return per page.

tools.name: jfrog_get_package_curation_status
tools.description: Useful for checking the curation status of a specific package version. Returns one of the following statuses: approved, blocked, inconclusive.

packageName.description: The name of the package, as it appears in the package repository.

packageVersion.description: The version of the package, as it appears in the package repository.

tools.name: jfrog_list_permission_targets
tools.description: Get a list of all permission targets in the JFrog platform

tools.name: jfrog_get_permission_target
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific permission target

name.description: The name of the permission target to retrieve

tools.name: jfrog_create_permission_target
tools.description: Create a new permission target in the JFrog platform

groups.description: The actions that the group can perform on the resource

tools.name: jfrog_update_permission_target
tools.description: Update an existing permission target in the JFrog platform

name.description: The name of the permission target to update

groups.description: The actions that the group can perform on the resource

tools.name: jfrog_delete_permission_target
tools.description: Delete a permission target from the JFrog platform

name.description: The name of the permission target to delete

tools.name: jfrog_get_permission_resource
tools.description: Get details of a specific resource type within a permission target

name.description: The name of the permission target

resourceType.description: The type of resource to retrieve

tools.name: jfrog_update_permission_resource
tools.description: Update a specific resource type within a permission target

name.description: The name of the permission target

groups.description: The actions that the group can perform on the resource

resourceType.description: The type of resource to update

tools.name: jfrog_replace_permission_resource
tools.description: Replace a specific resource type within a permission target

name.description: The name of the permission target

groups.description: The actions that the group can perform on the resource

resourceType.description: The type of resource to replace

tools.name: jfrog_delete_permission_resource
tools.description: Delete a specific resource type from a permission target

name.description: The name of the permission target

resourceType.description: The type of resource to delete

tools.name: jfrog_get_artifacts_summary
tools.description: Get the summary of artifacts, one or many

paths.description: List of full paths of the artifacts, the full path should include the repositotiry name
